query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `broker_positions` (
  `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  `connectionId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `userId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `symbol` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `quantity` decimal(18, 8) NOT NULL,
  `side` enum('long', 'short') NOT NULL,
  `avgEntryPrice` decimal(18, 8) NOT NULL,
  `marketValue` decimal(18, 8),
  `costBasis` decimal(18, 8),
  `unrealizedPL` decimal(18, 8),
  `unrealizedPLPercent` decimal(8, 4),
  `currentPrice` decimal(18, 8),
  `lastSyncAt` timestamp NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2JvR2JmsVzzzo8g.542b2be615eb --database cYbBY4G8kX53fA5ZWwbsKK --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `broker_positions` (
  `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  `connectionId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `userId` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
  `symbol` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `quantity` decimal(18, 8) NOT NULL,
  `side` enum('long', 'short') NOT NULL,
  `avgEntryPrice` decimal(18, 8) NOT NULL,
  `marketValue` decimal(18, 8),
  `costBasis` decimal(18, 8),
  `unrealizedPL` decimal(18, 8),
  `unrealizedPLPercent` decimal(8, 4),
  `currentPrice` decimal(18, 8),
  `lastSyncAt` timestamp NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
